message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $140. This price reflects the quality and the worth of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $140 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm happy to purchase it for $125. This price is fair to both of us and allows me to stay within my budget.
